em:itemdesc-powdered-metal-temporal:
Vibrates faintly.

Better hold your breath while handling it.
game:handbook-item-usage-powdered-metal-: Might be useful to create objects that glow blue or purple.
game:handbook-item-usage-crushed-metal-t: Grind into a fine powder to use it.
em:itemdesc-ash-organic-plant: A mix of various plants burned down to ashes.
em:itemdesc-ash-organic-wood: A mix of various wood types burned down to ashes.
game:handbook-item-usage-ash-organic-slu: Dry with medium heat to turn into potash.
game:itemdesc-ore-corundum: Used as an abrasive to smooth and polish things.
game:itemdesc-ore-kernite: In powdered form it can be used to create borax.
game:handbook-item-usage-crushed-metal-u: Grind into a fine powder to use it.
game:handbook-item-usage-crushed-ore-pho: Grind into a fine powder to strenghten the glow of other ingredients.
game:handbook-item-usage-crushed-ore-cor: Hard edges make corundum ideal for planing even the hardest surfaces.
game:handbook-item-usage-crushed-ore-cup: Mixing copper with nickel creates a more resistant alloy.
game:handbook-item-usage-crushed-chromit: An important ingredient for refractory bricks. Grind into a fine powder to use it as pigment.
game:item-handbooktext-ore-corundum: Hard semi-transparent crystals in many different colors. Rubies and sapphires are two common variants.
em:itemdesc-crushed-metal-rusty: Ancient black metal edges glint through the rust.
em:itemdesc-crushed-ore-cupronickel: Crushed pieces of a copper-nickel metal alloy.
em:itemdesc-crushed-ore-magnetite: Свет мерцает и переливается на кристаллах.
em:itemdesc-powdered-metal-nickel: Несмотря на серебристый блеск руды, никель дает темно-синий или даже черный цвет.
em:itemdesc-powdered-metal-tin: Нагрейте его на огне, чтобы получить оксид олова.
em:itemdesc-powdered-metal-uranium:
Emits a faint yellow glow.

Do not inhale!
em:itemdesc-powdered-metal-zinc: I wonder what this could be used for?
em:itemdesc-powdered-ore-boneash: Важный ингредиент для фарфора, молочного стекла и стекла.
em:itemdesc-powdered-ore-cassiterite: White pigment and clouding agent, useful as mordant for dye making.
em:itemdesc-powdered-ore-chromite: Can be used as a mordant for dye making.
em:itemdesc-powdered-ore-cinnabar: Cinnabar, ground into a bright red-orange powder.
em:itemdesc-powdered-ore-corundum:
Very fine abrasive powder.

Do not inhale!
em:itemdesc-powdered-ore-cupronickel: A blend of copper, nickel and traces of iron.
em:itemdesc-powdered-ore-electrum: A blend of gold and silver.
em:itemdesc-powdered-ore-ilmenite: Делает цвета стекла более насыщенными и яркими.
em:itemdesc-powdered-ore-kernite: In powdered form it can be used to create borax.
em:itemdesc-powdered-ore-lapislazuli: Lapis lazuli, ground into a fine deep blue powder.
em:itemdesc-powdered-ore-limonite: Также известен как желтая или золотая охра.
em:itemdesc-powdered-ore-magnetite: Свет по-прежнему мерцает на этом темно-черном порошке.
em:itemdesc-powdered-ore-pentlandite: Обжарьте его, чтобы удалить сульфиды и получить никель.
em:itemdesc-powdered-ore-phosphorite:
Emits a very faint white glow.

Do not inhale!
em:itemdesc-powdered-ore-redphosphorus:
Emits a faint red glow.

Do not inhale!
em:itemdesc-powdered-ore-rhodochrosite: Gives glass and ceramic glazes a pink, violet or dark green color.
em:itemdesc-powdered-ore-ultramarine: Lapis lazuli, ground into a fine powder.
em:itemdesc-powdered-ore-whitephosphorus: Glows in the dark.Do not inhale!
em:itemdesc-powdered-ore-whitelead:
White pigment.

... and they placed lead pieces in pots with strong vinegar, covered them in manure and spent tannin and left them for three fortnights...
em:itemdesc-powdered-ore-yellowcake:
Concentrated uranium oxide.

Don't eat the yellow cake.
em:itemdesc-powdered-ore-zincoxide: Also known as zinc white. An ingredient for bright white paint and glazings.
game:handbook-item-usage-powdered: Используется как пигмент для окрашивания различных продуктов.
game:handbook-item-usage-powdered-metal-: Produces blue or green colors if combined with lime. Copper alone produces a very dark red, opaque glass.
При обжиге свинца образуется оксид свинца, который является основой ярко-желтых и красных пигментов.
Useful for creating deep blue, black or purple colors.
Creates green, brown, grey or even black colors.
Нагревание олова превратит его в оксид олова, белый порошок, используемый для глазурей.
Might be useful to create objects that glow yellow or green.
Might be useful to coat other metals to increase their corrosion resistance.
game:handbook-item-usage-powdered-stone-: Contains aluminium oxide and traces of iron oxides. These create orange or red colors.
Powdered granite is an important ingredient for porcelain.
Can be useful for dark glass colors.
game:handbook-item-usage-powdered-ore-bo: Важный ингредиент для тончайшего фарфора, молочной глазури и молочного стекла. Также может быть использовано как удобрение.
game:handbook-item-usage-powdered-ore-ca: Creates white colors and turns mixtures opaque.
game:handbook-item-usage-powdered-ore-ch: When heated, turns into chromium oxide, which has a vibrant green color.
Powdered chromium oxide, also known as Viridian. Creates a rich and deep green color in dyes, glazings and glass.
game:handbook-item-usage-powdered-ore-co: Useful as black pigment and for making bombs.
Composed of thousands tiny sharp crystals, corundum is ideal for polishing even the hardest surfaces.
game:handbook-item-usage-powdered-ore-cu: This alloy is easily workable and still more resistant than pure copper.
A blend of copper and nickel, often strengthened by adding traces of iron and manganese.
game:handbook-item-usage-powdered-ore-fl: Can replace borax in glass making and glazes. Increases the glow of luminous materials.
game:handbook-item-usage-powdered-ore-el: What could it be useful for?
game:handbook-item-usage-powdered-ore-ga: Обжарка галенита удалит сульфиды и приведет к порошкообразному оксиду свинца, который является основой для ярко-желтых и красных пигментов.
game:handbook-item-usage-powdered-stone-: Измельченный гранит является важным ингредиентом для фарфора.
game:handbook-item-usage-powdered-ore-gr: Powdered graphite is used in ceramics and for electronic components.
game:handbook-item-usage-powdered-ore-he: Powdered iron oxide, creates orange or red colors.
game:handbook-item-usage-powdered-ore-il: Необработанный титан можно добавлять в стеклянные шихты для получения более насыщенных цветов.
game:handbook-item-usage-powdered-ore-ke: Seal in a barrel with water to turn it into borax.
game:handbook-item-usage-powdered-ore-la: Lapis lazuli ground to a fine powder. Creates deep blue colors.
game:handbook-item-usage-powdered-ore-le: Смесь красного и желтого оксидов свинца. При осторожном нагревании и охлаждении он превратится в ярко-желтый и красный пигменты.
game:handbook-item-usage-powdered-ore-li: Powdered iron oxide, creates yellow or orange colors.

Форма оксида свинца ярко-красного цвета.
Используется в качестве пигмента для окрашивания и окрашивания различных продуктов.
game:handbook-item-usage-powdered-ore-ma: Slightly magnetic mixture of powdered iron oxides, used for black colors and to darken glass.
A bright green-blue copper oxide mixture. Creates a wonderful teal color.
Produces black or dark brown colors and discolors glass by removing iron oxid impurities.
Produces rich and deep green colors.

Форма оксида свинца ярко-желтого цвета.
Используется в качестве пигмента для окрашивания различных продуктов.
game:handbook-item-usage-powdered-ore-pe: Обжиг пентландита удалит загрязнения и приведет к образованию никеля, который затем можно использовать для окрашивания или окрашивания различных продуктов.
game:handbook-item-usage-powdered-ore-ph: Increases the glow of objects in the dark.
game:handbook-item-usage-powdered-ore-qu: Порошок кварца кажется почти белым и является основой для всех рецептов стекла и глазурей.
game:handbook-item-usage-powdered-ore-rh: Also known as Manganese carbonate. Used alone it will create pink or violet shades, together with iron it produces a lovely dark green color.
game:handbook-item-usage-powdered-ore-re: Might be useful to create objects that glow reddish or orange.
game:handbook-item-usage-powdered-ore-sp: Zinc sulfide. Roasting it will remove the sulphur and create powdered zinc.
game:handbook-item-usage-powdered-ore-ul: Creates deep blue or purple colors.
game:handbook-item-usage-powdered-ore-ve: Creates deep orange and red colors, or purple when combined with blue.
game:handbook-item-usage-powdered-ore-wh: Might be useful to create objects that glow bright.
Used as a pigment in glazings and white glass.
game:handbook-item-usage-powdered-ore-ye: A strong pigment that causes glass to glow yellow or green in the dark.
game:handbook-item-usage-powdered-ore-zi: Used as white pigment in dyes, glazings and glass.
em:itemdesc-powdered-ore-granite: Convert in crafting grid to use it.
game:handbook-item-usage-crushed-ore-gra: Old item left-over from a previous version. Convert in your crafting grid to use it.
game:handbook-item-usage-powdered-ore-ba: Old item left-over from a previous version. Convert in campfire or your crafting grid to use it.
game:handbook-item-usage-powdered-ore-gr: Old item left-over from a previous version. Convert in your crafting grid to use it.
